We, the American people, deserve better and must feel assured that our election process is honest and legitimate. (2/2)

Universal mail-in voting (sending every registered voter a ballot by mail whether they request it or not) has shaken many Americans' confidence in the election process. Many ballots went to wrong addresses and/or were never received at all, leaving the door open to fraud. (1/2)
Some say they want all votes counted. I say we want all LEGAL votes counted. The difference is clear and critical.
This is not a partisan debate, but a defense of our democracy.

All credible allegations of voting irregularities should be investigated in order to preserve our election process. All Americans should want to protect the integrity of our elections by making sure that all legally cast ballots are counted before a winner is declared.
